data.title: Endpoint: /api/list-games
data.desc: The /api/list-games endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of games from the Games Checker API. Itâ€™s a public endpoint, meaning you can access it without an API key â€” perfect for quick testing or public applications.

data.title: What is api list-games?
data.desc: The list-games feature is used to fetch a collection of games, optionally filtered by parameters like title, platform, or region. This endpoint is designed for:
other: Browsing games by category or console

dataWithCode.title: ðŸ§ª Example Fetch
dataWithCode.pre:
fetch('https://nuv-games-api.vercel.app/api/list-games')
 .then(res => res.json())
 .then(data => console.log(data))
 .catch(err => console.error('Error fetching games:', err));`
